detaileddescription.para:
Traceability - SWR and SWDD The traceability between SWR and SWDD (model and implementation) is established on SW unit and function/code level by requirements identifier links. The overview of the requirements allocation on file level can be found here:
VW_ICAS1.Common.Requirements.5. SWR_ICAS1_BSW_L3_CRoute_Diag_Chorus_RL78 The overview of the requirements allocation on function level can be found here: VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.Diag_Chorus_RL78.SW Architecture.SW Requirements.SW Requirements

Traceability - SWA and SWDD The traceability between SWA and SWDD is established by using an identical component name. Provided component:
Component name in EA
SWDD
SysWDDiagnosis
#SysWDDiagnosis
Traceability - SWDD and Implementation The traceability between SWDD and implementation is established by using identical SW unit and function names (in SWDD and implementation).
